ygData.subject: RE: Char Catillion
ygData.msgSnippet: I dunno. My enchanter is at 129 charisma without buffs. Or even all the Charisma jewelry she could have. (What she has is silver, not high level) So I suspect
ygData.messageBody:
I dunno. My enchanter is at 129 charisma without buffs. Or even all the
Charisma jewelry she could have. (What she has is silver, not high level) So
I suspect you could get quite a bit higher.
